text: Musapembedze wina aliyense koma Mulungu ndipo musatumikire milungu ina. Aliyense amene amatumikira milungu ina yoonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni, ali ngati iye amene agwa kuchokera kumwamba, ndipo asanagwe pansi, amalandiridwa ndi mbalame kapena kunyamulidwa ndi mphepo kukamâ€™taya kumalo akutali
